name: NAME
change_pwd_text:
Sometimes you do not like it anymore, sometimes it is just time to reset your credentials for safety or because someone already know your password.

You are in the good place for this, once completed the fields just click the button and farewell your old password.
forgot_pwd_text: It happens to anyone, write down the mail you used to register and click the button to recieve your new password.
inconvenience_messaage: If you do not know what it is all about, sorry for the inconvenience, it seems a client made a mistake while writing its email adress. Anyway you can visit us at Cotiz.net if you want to know more !
company_legals:
